# File.GetFiles method

Returns a collection that contains all files in a folder with the specified criterial.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<string> GetFiles(string folder, string criterial, int timeThreshold = 0)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| folder | The folder. |
| criterial | The criterial. |
| timeThreshold | The time threshold. |

## Return Value

A IEnumerable that contains all files in a folder with the specified criterial.
